Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Annotation Types
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    org.gradle.api.tasks.CompatibilityAdapterForTaskInputs
    The interface is only here to allow plugins built against Gradle 2.x to run and it will be removed in Gradle 4.0.
    org.gradle.api.tasks.CompatibilityAdapterForTaskOutputs
    The interface is only here to allow plugins built against Gradle 2.x to run and it will be removed in Gradle 4.0.
    org.gradle.plugins.javascript.rhino.worker.RhinoWorker
    org.gradle.plugins.javascript.rhino.worker.RhinoWorkerHandleFactory
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.gradle.api.plugins.jetty.AbstractJettyRunTask
    The Jetty plugin has been deprecated
    org.gradle.api.plugins.jetty.JettyPlugin
    The Jetty plugin has been deprecated
    org.gradle.api.plugins.jetty.JettyPluginConvention
    The Jetty plugin has been deprecated
    org.gradle.api.plugins.jetty.JettyRun
    The Jetty plugin has been deprecated
    org.gradle.api.plugins.jetty.JettyRunWar
    The Jetty plugin has been deprecated
    org.gradle.api.plugins.jetty.JettyStop
    The Jetty plugin has been deprecated
    org.gradle.plugins.javascript.rhino.worker.RhinoWorkerUtils
    org.gradle.api.plugins.jetty.ScanTargetPattern
    The Jetty plugin has been deprecated
  • Deprecated Annotation Types 
    Annotation Type and Description
    org.gradle.api.tasks.OrderSensitive
    This annotation will be removed in Gradle 4.0. For classpath properties, use Classpath.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.gradle.api.tasks.compile.CompileOptions.depend(Map)
    org.gradle.api.tasks.TaskInputFilePropertyBuilder.dir(Object)
    Use TaskInputs.dir(Object) directly instead.
    org.gradle.api.tasks.TaskOutputFilePropertyBuilder.dir(Object)
    Use TaskOutputs.dir(Object) instead.
    org.gradle.api.tasks.TaskInputFilePropertyBuilder.file(Object)
    Use TaskInputs.file(Object) directly instead.
    org.gradle.api.tasks.TaskOutputFilePropertyBuilder.file(Object)
    Use TaskOutputs.file(Object) instead.
    org.gradle.api.tasks.TaskInputFilePropertyBuilder.files(Object...)
    Use TaskInputs.files(Object...) directly instead.
    org.gradle.api.tasks.TaskOutputFilePropertyBuilder.files(Object...)
    Use TaskOutputs.files(Object...) instead.
    org.gradle.testing.jacoco.plugins.JacocoTaskExtension.getAgent()
    Agent should be considered final.
    org.gradle.api.artifacts.ModuleDependency.getConfiguration()
    Use ModuleDependency.getTargetConfiguration() instead
    org.gradle.api.tasks.compile.JavaCompile.getDependencyCacheDir()
    org.gradle.api.plugins.JavaPluginConvention.getDependencyCacheDir()
    org.gradle.api.plugins.JavaPluginConvention.getDependencyCacheDirName()
    org.gradle.tooling.model.idea.IdeaModuleDependency.getDependencyModule()
    org.gradle.api.tasks.TaskInputFilePropertyBuilder.getFiles()
    Use TaskInputs.getFiles() directly instead.
    org.gradle.api.tasks.TaskOutputFilePropertyBuilder.getFiles()
    Use TaskOutputs.getFiles() instead.
    org.gradle.plugins.ide.eclipse.model.ProjectDependency.getGradlePath()
    org.gradle.api.tasks.TaskInputFilePropertyBuilder.getHasInputs()
    Use TaskInputs.getHasInputs() directly instead.
    org.gradle.api.tasks.TaskOutputFilePropertyBuilder.getHasOutput()
    Use TaskOutputs.getHasOutput() instead.
    org.gradle.api.tasks.TaskInputFilePropertyBuilder.getHasSourceFiles()
    Use TaskInputs.getHasSourceFiles() directly instead.
    org.gradle.testing.jacoco.plugins.JacocoPluginExtension.getLogger()
    logger should be considered final.
    org.gradle.api.artifacts.ProjectDependency.getProjectConfiguration()
    A project dependency may select different configurations.
    org.gradle.api.tasks.TaskInputFilePropertyBuilder.getProperties()
    Use TaskInputs.getProperties() directly instead.
    org.gradle.api.tasks.TaskInputFilePropertyBuilder.getSourceFiles()
    Use TaskInputs.getSourceFiles() directly instead.
    org.gradle.tooling.model.eclipse.EclipseProjectDependency.getTargetProject()
    org.gradle.api.tasks.compile.CompileOptions.isUseDepend()
    org.gradle.api.Task.leftShift(Closure)
    Use Task.doLast(Closure action)
    org.gradle.api.tasks.TaskInputFilePropertyBuilder.orderSensitive()
    This method will be removed in Gradle 4.0 without replacement.
    org.gradle.api.tasks.TaskInputFilePropertyBuilder.orderSensitive(boolean)
    This method will be removed in Gradle 4.0 without replacement.
    org.gradle.api.tasks.TaskInputFilePropertyBuilder.properties(Map)
    Use TaskInputs.properties(Map) directly instead.
    org.gradle.api.tasks.TaskInputFilePropertyBuilder.property(String, Object)
    Use TaskInputs.property(String, Object) directly instead.
    org.gradle.api.artifacts.FileCollectionDependency.registerWatchPoints(FileSystemSubset.Builder)
    Use FileCollectionDependency.getFiles() instead.
    org.gradle.testing.jacoco.plugins.JacocoTaskExtension.setAgent(JacocoAgentJar)
    Agent should be considered final.
    org.gradle.api.tasks.compile.JavaCompile.setDependencyCacheDir(File)
    org.gradle.api.plugins.JavaPluginConvention.setDependencyCacheDirName(String)
    org.gradle.plugins.ide.eclipse.model.ProjectDependency.setGradlePath(String)
    org.gradle.testing.jacoco.plugins.JacocoPluginExtension.setLogger(Logger)
    logger should be considered final.
    org.gradle.api.plugins.JavaPluginConvention.setProject(ProjectInternal)
    Project should be considered final.
    org.gradle.api.tasks.compile.CompileOptions.setUseDepend(boolean)
    org.gradle.api.tasks.TaskInputs.source(Object...)
    Use TaskInputs.files(Object...) instead and set skipWhenEmpty to true.
    org.gradle.api.tasks.TaskInputFilePropertyBuilder.source(Object...)
    Use TaskInputs.source(Object...) directly instead.
    org.gradle.api.tasks.TaskInputs.source(Object)
    Use TaskInputs.file(Object) instead and set skipWhenEmpty to true.
    org.gradle.api.tasks.TaskInputFilePropertyBuilder.source(Object)
    Use TaskInputs.source(Object) directly instead.
    org.gradle.api.tasks.TaskInputs.sourceDir(Object)
    Use TaskInputs.dir(Object) instead and set skipWhenEmpty to true.
    org.gradle.api.tasks.TaskInputFilePropertyBuilder.sourceDir(Object)
    Use TaskInputs.sourceDir(Object) directly instead.
    org.gradle.api.tasks.TaskOutputFilePropertyBuilder.upToDateWhen(Closure)
    Use TaskOutputs.upToDateWhen(Closure) instead.
    org.gradle.api.tasks.TaskOutputFilePropertyBuilder.upToDateWhen(Spec)
    Use TaskOutputs.upToDateWhen(Spec) instead.
    org.gradle.api.java.archives.Manifest.writeTo(Writer)
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    org.gradle.plugins.ide.eclipse.model.AccessRule(Object, Object)
    org.gradle.plugins.ear.EarPluginConvention(Instantiator)
    org.gradle.plugins.ide.idea.model.JarDirectory(Object, Object)
    org.gradle.plugins.ide.idea.model.Jdk(Object, Object, Object, Object)
    org.gradle.plugins.ide.idea.model.ModuleDependency(Object, Object)
    org.gradle.plugins.ide.eclipse.model.ProjectDependency(String, String)
    Use ProjectDependency.ProjectDependency(String) instead
    org.gradle.plugins.ide.eclipse.model.WbDependentModule(Object)
    org.gradle.plugins.ide.eclipse.model.WbProperty(Object)
    org.gradle.plugins.ide.eclipse.model.WbResource(Object)
